Paragraph.Text: These interconnect T4 batteries in a straight line that are closer than 128 meters and balances power between them. Build in a 3x3x1 configuration attached to the T4 PSB's at the source and destination.
These can be aligned in any cardinal direction, and it's recommended that you interlink the majority of your base together to provide an infrastructure capable of storing millions of power.
